name: Potato, Potato!
description:
Celestial Dreams in collaboration with Agrico UK presents Potato, Potato! A prototype project developed for Android devices as part of our studies at Abertay University.

In this game you can grow verities of potatoes offered by Agrico, and use them to cook and prep different tasty dishes!
